English To English Translation - Ravichandran Ashwin Is In Splits Over This Funny Pakistan-Sri Lanka Post-Match Moment

English To English Translation - Ravichandran Ashwin Is In Splits Over This Funny Pakistan-Sri Lanka Post-Match Moment

Pakistan lost the T20I series 3-0 to Sri Lanka despite being the top ranked team in the format. But the highlight in the final game was at the presentation which had people in splits.

One person was Ravichandran Ashwin and he could not stop himself from sharing the incident on the internet.

Wanindu Hasaranga, won the Man of the Match and the Man of the Series award and was called up by announcer Ramiz Raja while there was a translator present to help Hasaranga out.

Ramiz's first question was if it was the best bowling performance by the latter. The Sri Lankan answered 'yes' and for reasons only he knew, Ramiz asked the translator, and the reply was , 'he said yes'. It was a funny moment as we witnessed English to English translation.

This is how Ashwin shared the video.

Don't Miss 235 SHARES 707 SHARES 1.7 K SHARES

Hasaranga took 3/21 in four overs.

"My wrong un is my go-to ball and I use it smartly to deceive the batsman. I try to absorb the pressure and bowl as many dots as I can. I believe I have got enough variations to pick up wickets," he said.

With Inputs From TNN.
